Title: Animal Mimicry
info: -2in./1MP to cost of Hvy. Wood, Hvy. Jungle, Urban terrain.
All enemy units within 6in./3 hex to this unit:
roll 2D6, 8 or less, enemy unit is Intimidated.

Title: Antagonizer
info: -2in./1MP to cost of Hvy. Wood, Hvy. Jungle, Urban terrain.
All enemy units within 6in./3 hex to this unit:
roll 2D6, 8 or less, enemy unit is Intimidated.
